S.FORM: == nilacul == Daren (Hulam a sulit: 達仁鄉) a sakuwan ku Taitung. kumud nu kalesakan, 320.55 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 192.37 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 87.57 km²), u kasabinawlan, 2,544 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 1,020 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 2,374 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 93%(Paiwan) ku kasabinawlan. u Paiwan ku sakalaniyazu'. nikasakuwakuwan Daren mala 6 a cuwen atu 10 ku niyazu'. kina 10 a niyazu'sa, Larepaq , Tjuaqau , Seljupetje , Aljungic , Sinka , Mulinaga , Tjuabal , Dralendren , Tjuavanaq , Tjuamanges . 達仁鄉 ta-zen a kenis ta-zen a kenis ( nu piywan a kamu: Tadren ) i Taywan i satimulan nu pusung, saamisan micapi tu cin-fun a kenis, sawalian micapi tu ta-u a kenis, timul nu amisan malitin tu tay-ma-li a kenis. sawali nu timul micapi tu taypinyang, satipan micapi tu pin-tung-siyan lay-i' a kenis, cun-ze a kenis atu se-ce a kenis, satimulan maliting tu pintung siyan mu-tan a kenis. labu ninakenis nu tademaw makaala tu 3.5 a balebutan, u puaung ku sanai'ayay nu tademaw a kakenisan. kitidaan nu lala' i cung-yang-san-may i satimulan, ta-u-san nan-lu, 90% namin u masaadiadiay nu buyu'buyu'an, nai' ku masaenalay nu duyu', idaw ku ta-u a sawac, an-suo a sawac, hung-kang a sawac namin u kakaydaan micaliway tinakenisan, ya demiad u caldesay a demiad nu bali. i labu nu kenis i Taywan a yincumicu u paywa ku yadahay, nilaculan u malukay namin ku kawaw, u sasakamuan nu paywan a binacadan u pawanay a kamu. 歷史laylay u kitidaan nu yincumicu i ta-zen a kenis i liwliw u paywancu namin, yu kasumamadan henay sa u kaldabuan i tida i a-suo-wiy-se, sakay nu an-suo ku satabakiay, satu '' u an-suo '' (a-lang-i' ALjungic ) i paywan a kamu sa u tatuduan ku '' sayadahay nu tademaw i se '' nu kalipuna henay a nipikuwan, u lipun benisan ku yincumin a kenis palu u tu-wa-pa-le ( tu-pan), ta-pan-lu ( tay-pan), ta-li-li ( sen-yung ), cuw-ka-ku-lay, a-lan-wiy,(an-su) namin kina limaay a kenis. sayawa a nikenisan u pusung a kenis kilusaan u ta-u a kakenisan, u pusung a kenis ku mikuwanay, hamin nu kenis idaw ku nipadeng tu taylin, picudadan, u kataisingan tu sakay demiaddemiad a mikawaw. nadikudan namalalais tu sayaway mababenis han palu pusung a kenis i ta-u a kenis, 1946 a mihcaan namakayda i ta-u a kenis, namahuda satu idaw ku tapang u sakakaay patayda i pusung a mitatengail tua nipangangan tu nganga u '' ta-zen a kenis'', kapah tu atu ta-u a kenis macacumudcumud malcabaycabay sakay i niyanuan, nika caay kanamuh ku sakakaay nu itidaay, u tatanga han malcacad u ta saniy, mahida tu unuta-u a kenisan ku nikasaan, nayi' ku masacacay a nahulican . namahida sa u sakakaay sinipatayda tu i kenis mala tapang ''ke-liyang-pay '' mipalita tu a mitatengil tu sakakaay atu niyaduay, hican kina ''ta' '' a misumad palu ''ta'' han, hami nu kayki a pahecek sa, patababaw i pusung a kingsihu paadih sapalahci. widatu ya limaay a binacadan nu yincumin u paycacayay a kenis ku pusung. 大武山自然保留區 ta-u a buyu' u nipaliwan a kenis u tahek u li-u'ci i 1988 a mihcaan kinaitiniay a kenis u sapahanhan a kitidaan nu lekedaw, babemisen palu nu ta-u a buyu' u nu tahakay a nipiliwanan kina kenis. u ahebal nu lalay' makaala tu 47,000 a kubup, hamin nu Taywan a kanatal nu lala' kaahbal 1,3%, namahida mikilul tiya u i'-san atu taluku tusaay a kanatal a piadihan tu aidangan, mamin nu Taywan u sakatuluay a tabaki nu aadingan a kenis. kina kenisan namakayda i amis katukuh i timul hamin nu li-ciya a sawac, ce-pen a sawac, tay-ma-li a sawac, cin-lung a sawac atu ta-cu a sawac nikasaupuan kina limaay a sasaupuan tu nanum a kenis, namakatelek nu talakaw hatida u 200-3,100 a ditek mabaad kya kitidaan, u caayay kahapinang a katukuhiy nu dadan a pabesutay i kung-lu kina kenisk a kakitidaan, u nikasaan satabajiay a lala' nipiliwan, u sadatahakay a kilangkilanga masatatudungay a nipiliwan i buyu'. 土坂村 tu-pan a niyadu' u sakatinenga a nganga kya '' tu-pan '' u nipanganga aca ''uki' a niyadu' '', i naayaw sa u ta-cu a sawac tamelacay sa ku sawacay a nanum, u sakaidaw ku kaldabuan nu buting u kabus, i sadingsingan nikasasumad nu mihca, u nu ki' a mihcaan tahkal, nika kabaliyus tu papa a baliyus sisa matastas, hanika ayda malangad henay ku sawacan misakapah tu sawac. tu-pan a ungsin, u nanum nai' ku kulit nai' ku sanek nu tan-suwan nu nemneman a nanum, kanca taneng mibanaw tanemililuc taneng tu nanumen, unu tu-pan a niyadu caay kaw u ki' dada nu masadumaay a tuu'd. 南田海岸親水公園 na-tin dadipasan a nanum a piidangan . na-tiyin a dadipasan a nanum tu piidangan i ta-zen a kenis nu nan-tiyin a niyadu' atu makasasaay nu na-tiyin a niyadu' a laed, duduc han ku dadan nu tay-ciw-sin paliyung tu dadan i 26 sin, taayawen aca ku culil tu tusa a lasubu nu titek, kanca makaadih tu takelalay a taypinyangan, mikilu tu demiatan nikasumad, taneng a miadih tu masadumaay ku bangcal nu taypinyang .labu nu pidangan sa idaw ku piadihan nu kitidaan atu u niapitan tu culay a caculilan. i tepal nu piidangan a nanum sa u dadipasan, maadih ku kalumenian, idaw ku salengacay masabunaway a ba'tu nu na-tiyin, sumelic sa ku hekal a takelal, u kakaydihan nu katuutay mikilin tu ba'tu a midimud sapisinga. nika pacudad tu ku sihu nu pusung, la'cus tu muwala' tu ba'tu nu na-tiyin. 南田人文景觀觀景台 u cacekawan tu aadihab nu na-tiyin zen-un . cacekawan tu aadihab nu na-tiyin zen-un taneng i baad ku nipiadih tu na-tiyin a dadipasan u sinanumay a pidangang atu nan-tiyin a niyadu'. i pusung sadimulanay u nan-tiyin a niyadu' sakacapuan nu paywan a binacadan, mapulung namin ku binacadan misanga tu '' aadihan tu cudad nu niyadu' '', pacumud tu sakayadah i tineng, pacunus aca tu sakatinen a kitidaan, i panan nu piadian tu cudad idaw kya ludak, u piw-cong a kulit, u malemetay kina paywan a binacadan. i tepal nu picekawan sa, idaw kya cacayay a pibatikalan a dadan nu zen-un tu aadihan i ta-zen a kenis, ya babatikalan idaw ku limaay a lasubu nu ditek, taneng henay a tababaw miadih tu ahbalay nu piadiha ku bangcal nu bayu. 達仁鄉 ta-zen a kenis ta-zen a kenis ( nu piywan a kamu: Tadren ) i Taywan i satimulan nu pusung, saamisan micapi tu cin-fun a kenis, sawalian micapi tu ta-u a kenis, timul nu amisan malitin tu tay-ma-li a kenis. sawali nu timul micapi tu taypinyang, satipan micapi tu pin-tung-siyan lay-i' a kenis, cun-ze a kenis atu se-ce a kenis, satimulan maliting tu pintung siyan mu-tan a kenis. labu ninakenis nu tademaw makaala tu 3.5 a balebutan, u puaung ku sanai'ayay nu tademaw a kakenisan. kitidaan nu lala' i cung-yang-san-may i satimulan, ta-u-san nan-lu, 90% namin u masaadiadiay nu buyu'buyu'an, nai' ku masaenalay nu duyu', idaw ku ta-u a sawac, an-suo a sawac, hung-kang a sawac namin u kakaydaan micaliway tinakenisan, ya demiad u caldesay a demiad nu bali. i labu nu kenis i Taywan a yincumicu u paywa ku yadahay, nilaculan u malukay namin ku kawaw, u sasakamuan nu paywan a binacadan u pawanay a kamu. 歷史laylay u kitidaan nu yincumicu i ta-zen a kenis i liwliw u paywancu namin, yu kasumamadan henay sa u kaldabuan i tida i a-suo-wiy-se, sakay nu an-suo ku satabakiay, satu '' u an-suo '' (a-lang-i' ALjungic ) i paywan a kamu sa u tatuduan ku '' sayadahay nu tademaw i se '' nu kalipuna henay a nipikuwan, u lipun benisan ku yincumin a kenis palu u tu-wa-pa-le ( tu-pan), ta-pan-lu ( tay-pan), ta-li-li ( sen-yung ), cuw-ka-ku-lay, a-lan-wiy,(an-su) namin kina limaay a kenis. sayawa a nikenisan u pusung a kenis kilusaan u ta-u a kakenisan, u pusung a kenis ku mikuwanay, hamin nu kenis idaw ku nipadeng tu taylin, picudadan, u kataisingan tu sakay demiaddemiad a mikawaw. nadikudan namalalais tu sayaway mababenis han palu pusung a kenis i ta-u a kenis, 1946 a mihcaan namakayda i ta-u a kenis, namahuda satu idaw ku tapang u sakakaay patayda i pusung a mitatengail tua nipangangan tu nganga u '' ta-zen a kenis'', kapah tu atu ta-u a kenis macacumudcumud malcabaycabay sakay i niyanuan, nika caay kanamuh ku sakakaay nu itidaay, u tatanga han malcacad u ta saniy, mahida tu unuta-u a kenisan ku nikasaan, nayi' ku masacacay a nahulican . namahida sa u sakakaay sinipatayda tu i kenis mala tapang ''ke-liyang-pay '' mipalita tu a mitatengil tu sakakaay atu niyaduay, hican kina ''ta' '' a misumad palu ''ta'' han, hami nu kayki a pahecek sa, patababaw i pusung a kingsihu paadih sapalahci. widatu ya limaay a binacadan nu yincumin u paycacayay a kenis ku pusung. 大武山自然保留區 ta-u a buyu' u nipaliwan a kenis u tahek u li-u'ci i 1988 a mihcaan kinaitiniay a kenis u sapahanhan a kitidaan nu lekedaw, babemisen palu nu ta-u a buyu' u nu tahakay a nipiliwanan kina kenis. u ahebal nu lalay' makaala tu 47,000 a kubup, hamin nu Taywan a kanatal nu lala' kaahbal 1,3%, namahida mikilul tiya u i'-san atu taluku tusaay a kanatal a piadihan tu aidangan, mamin nu Taywan u sakatuluay a tabaki nu aadingan a kenis. kina kenisan namakayda i amis katukuh i timul hamin nu li-ciya a sawac, ce-pen a sawac, tay-ma-li a sawac, cin-lung a sawac atu ta-cu a sawac nikasaupuan kina limaay a sasaupuan tu nanum a kenis, namakatelek nu talakaw hatida u 200-3,100 a ditek mabaad kya kitidaan, u caayay kahapinang a katukuhiy nu dadan a pabesutay i kung-lu kina kenisk a kakitidaan, u nikasaan satabajiay a lala' nipiliwan, u sadatahakay a kilangkilanga masatatudungay a nipiliwan i buyu'. 土坂村 tu-pan a niyadu' u sakatinenga a nganga kya '' tu-pan '' u nipanganga aca ''uki' a niyadu' '', i naayaw sa u ta-cu a sawac tamelacay sa ku sawacay a nanum, u sakaidaw ku kaldabuan nu buting u kabus, i sadingsingan nikasasumad nu mihca, u nu ki' a mihcaan tahkal, nika kabaliyus tu papa a baliyus sisa matastas, hanika ayda malangad henay ku sawacan misakapah tu sawac. tu-pan a ungsin, u nanum nai' ku kulit nai' ku sanek nu tan-suwan nu nemneman a nanum, kanca taneng mibanaw tanemililuc taneng tu nanumen, unu tu-pan a niyadu caay kaw u ki' dada nu masadumaay a tuu'd. 南田海岸親水公園 na-tin dadipasan a nanum a piidangan . na-tiyin a dadipasan a nanum tu piidangan i ta-zen a kenis nu nan-tiyin a niyadu' atu makasasaay nu na-tiyin a niyadu' a laed, duduc han ku dadan nu tay-ciw-sin paliyung tu dadan i 26 sin, taayawen aca ku culil tu tusa a lasubu nu titek, kanca makaadih tu takelalay a taypinyangan, mikilu tu demiatan nikasumad, taneng a miadih tu masadumaay ku bangcal nu taypinyang .labu nu pidangan sa idaw ku piadihan nu kitidaan atu u niapitan tu culay a caculilan. i tepal nu piidangan a nanum sa u dadipasan, maadih ku kalumenian, idaw ku salengacay masabunaway a ba'tu nu na-tiyin, sumelic sa ku hekal a takelal, u kakaydihan nu katuutay mikilin tu ba'tu a midimud sapisinga. nika pacudad tu ku sihu nu pusung, la'cus tu muwala' tu ba'tu nu na-tiyin. 南田人文景觀觀景台 u cacekawan tu aadihab nu na-tiyin zen-un . cacekawan tu aadihab nu na-tiyin zen-un taneng i baad ku nipiadih tu na-tiyin a dadipasan u sinanumay a pidangang atu nan-tiyin a niyadu'. i pusung sadimulanay u nan-tiyin a niyadu' sakacapuan nu paywan a binacadan, mapulung namin ku binacadan misanga tu '' aadihan tu cudad nu niyadu' '', pacumud tu sakayadah i tineng, pacunus aca tu sakatinen a kitidaan, i panan nu piadian tu cudad idaw kya ludak, u piw-cong a kulit, u malemetay kina paywan a binacadan. i tepal nu picekawan sa, idaw kya cacayay a pibatikalan a dadan nu zen-un tu aadihan i ta-zen a kenis, ya babatikalan idaw ku limaay a lasubu nu ditek, taneng henay a tababaw miadih tu ahbalay nu piadiha ku bangcal nu bayu.

== nilacol == Daren (Holam a solit: 達仁鄉) a sakowan ko Taitong. komod no kalesakan, 320.55 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 192.37 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 87.57 km²), o kasabinawlan, 2,544 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 1,020 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 2,374 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 93%(Paiwan) ko kasabinawlan. o Paiwan ko sakalaniyazo'. nikasakowakowan Daren mala 6 a cowen ato 10 ko niyazo'. kina 10 a niyazo'sa, Larepaq , Tjoaqao , Seljopetje , Aljongic , Sinka , Molinaga , Tjoabal , Dralendren , Tjoavanaq , Tjoamanges . 達仁鄉 ta-zen a kenis ta-zen a kenis ( no piywan a kamo: Tadren ) i Taywan i satimolan no posong, saamisan micapi to cin-fon a kenis, sawalian micapi to ta-o a kenis, timol no amisan malitin to tay-ma-li a kenis. sawali no timol micapi to taypinyang, satipan micapi to pin-tong-siyan lay-i' a kenis, con-ze a kenis ato se-ce a kenis, satimolan maliting to pintong siyan mo-tan a kenis. labo ninakenis no tademaw makaala to 3.5 a balebotan, o poaong ko sanai'ayay no tademaw a kakenisan. kitidaan no lala' i cong-yang-san-may i satimolan, ta-o-san nan-lo, 90% namin o masaadiadiay no boyo'boyo'an, nai' ko masaenalay no doyo', idaw ko ta-o a sawac, an-soo a sawac, hong-kang a sawac namin o kakaydaan micaliway tinakenisan, ya demiad o caldesay a demiad no bali. i labo no kenis i Taywan a yincomico o paywa ko yadahay, nilacolan o malokay namin ko kawaw, o sasakamoan no paywan a binacadan o pawanay a kamo. 歷史laylay o kitidaan no yincomico i ta-zen a kenis i liwliw o paywanco namin, yo kasomamadan henay sa o kaldaboan i tida i a-soo-wiy-se, sakay no an-soo ko satabakiay, sato '' o an-soo '' (a-lang-i' ALjongic ) i paywan a kamo sa o tatodoan ko '' sayadahay no tademaw i se '' no kalipona henay a nipikowan, o lipon benisan ko yincomin a kenis palo o to-wa-pa-le ( to-pan), ta-pan-lo ( tay-pan), ta-li-li ( sen-yong ), cow-ka-ko-lay, a-lan-wiy,(an-so) namin kina limaay a kenis. sayawa a nikenisan o posong a kenis kilosaan o ta-o a kakenisan, o posong a kenis ko mikowanay, hamin no kenis idaw ko nipadeng to taylin, picodadan, o kataisingan to sakay demiaddemiad a mikawaw. nadikodan namalalais to sayaway mababenis han palo posong a kenis i ta-o a kenis, 1946 a mihcaan namakayda i ta-o a kenis, namahoda sato idaw ko tapang o sakakaay patayda i posong a mitatengail toa nipangangan to nganga o '' ta-zen a kenis'', kapah to ato ta-o a kenis macacomodcomod malcabaycabay sakay i niyanoan, nika caay kanamoh ko sakakaay no itidaay, o tatanga han malcacad o ta saniy, mahida to onota-o a kenisan ko nikasaan, nayi' ko masacacay a naholican . namahida sa o sakakaay sinipatayda to i kenis mala tapang ''ke-liyang-pay '' mipalita to a mitatengil to sakakaay ato niyadoay, hican kina ''ta' '' a misomad palo ''ta'' han, hami no kayki a pahecek sa, patababaw i posong a kingsiho paadih sapalahci. widato ya limaay a binacadan no yincomin o paycacayay a kenis ko posong. 大武山自然保留區 ta-o a boyo' o nipaliwan a kenis o tahek o li-o'ci i 1988 a mihcaan kinaitiniay a kenis o sapahanhan a kitidaan no lekedaw, babemisen palo no ta-o a boyo' o no tahakay a nipiliwanan kina kenis. o ahebal no lalay' makaala to 47,000 a kobop, hamin no Taywan a kanatal no lala' kaahbal 1,3%, namahida mikilol tiya o i'-san ato taloko tosaay a kanatal a piadihan to aidangan, mamin no Taywan o sakatoloay a tabaki no aadingan a kenis. kina kenisan namakayda i amis katokoh i timol hamin no li-ciya a sawac, ce-pen a sawac, tay-ma-li a sawac, cin-long a sawac ato ta-co a sawac nikasaopoan kina limaay a sasaopoan to nanom a kenis, namakatelek no talakaw hatida o 200-3,100 a ditek mabaad kya kitidaan, o caayay kahapinang a katokohiy no dadan a pabesotay i kong-lo kina kenisk a kakitidaan, o nikasaan satabajiay a lala' nipiliwan, o sadatahakay a kilangkilanga masatatodongay a nipiliwan i boyo'. 土坂村 to-pan a niyado' o sakatinenga a nganga kya '' to-pan '' o nipanganga aca ''oki' a niyado' '', i naayaw sa o ta-co a sawac tamelacay sa ko sawacay a nanom, o sakaidaw ko kaldaboan no boting o kabos, i sadingsingan nikasasomad no mihca, o no ki' a mihcaan tahkal, nika kabaliyos to papa a baliyos sisa matastas, hanika ayda malangad henay ko sawacan misakapah to sawac. to-pan a ongsin, o nanom nai' ko kolit nai' ko sanek no tan-sowan no nemneman a nanom, kanca taneng mibanaw tanemililoc taneng to nanomen, ono to-pan a niyado caay kaw o ki' dada no masadomaay a too'd. 南田海岸親水公園 na-tin dadipasan a nanom a piidangan . na-tiyin a dadipasan a nanom to piidangan i ta-zen a kenis no nan-tiyin a niyado' ato makasasaay no na-tiyin a niyado' a laed, dodoc han ko dadan no tay-ciw-sin paliyong to dadan i 26 sin, taayawen aca ko colil to tosa a lasobo no titek, kanca makaadih to takelalay a taypinyangan, mikilo to demiatan nikasomad, taneng a miadih to masadomaay ko bangcal no taypinyang .labo no pidangan sa idaw ko piadihan no kitidaan ato o niapitan to colay a cacolilan. i tepal no piidangan a nanom sa o dadipasan, maadih ko kalomenian, idaw ko salengacay masabonaway a ba'to no na-tiyin, somelic sa ko hekal a takelal, o kakaydihan no katootay mikilin to ba'to a midimod sapisinga. nika pacodad to ko siho no posong, la'cos to mowala' to ba'to no na-tiyin. 南田人文景觀觀景台 o cacekawan to aadihab no na-tiyin zen-on . cacekawan to aadihab no na-tiyin zen-on taneng i baad ko nipiadih to na-tiyin a dadipasan o sinanomay a pidangang ato nan-tiyin a niyado'. i posong sadimolanay o nan-tiyin a niyado' sakacapoan no paywan a binacadan, mapolong namin ko binacadan misanga to '' aadihan to codad no niyado' '', pacomod to sakayadah i tineng, paconos aca to sakatinen a kitidaan, i panan no piadian to codad idaw kya lodak, o piw-cong a kolit, o malemetay kina paywan a binacadan. i tepal no picekawan sa, idaw kya cacayay a pibatikalan a dadan no zen-on to aadihan i ta-zen a kenis, ya babatikalan idaw ko limaay a lasobo no ditek, taneng henay a tababaw miadih to ahbalay no piadiha ko bangcal no bayo. 達仁鄉 ta-zen a kenis ta-zen a kenis ( no piywan a kamo: Tadren ) i Taywan i satimolan no posong, saamisan micapi to cin-fon a kenis, sawalian micapi to ta-o a kenis, timol no amisan malitin to tay-ma-li a kenis. sawali no timol micapi to taypinyang, satipan micapi to pin-tong-siyan lay-i' a kenis, con-ze a kenis ato se-ce a kenis, satimolan maliting to pintong siyan mo-tan a kenis. labo ninakenis no tademaw makaala to 3.5 a balebotan, o poaong ko sanai'ayay no tademaw a kakenisan. kitidaan no lala' i cong-yang-san-may i satimolan, ta-o-san nan-lo, 90% namin o masaadiadiay no boyo'boyo'an, nai' ko masaenalay no doyo', idaw ko ta-o a sawac, an-soo a sawac, hong-kang a sawac namin o kakaydaan micaliway tinakenisan, ya demiad o caldesay a demiad no bali. i labo no kenis i Taywan a yincomico o paywa ko yadahay, nilacolan o malokay namin ko kawaw, o sasakamoan no paywan a binacadan o pawanay a kamo. 歷史laylay o kitidaan no yincomico i ta-zen a kenis i liwliw o paywanco namin, yo kasomamadan henay sa o kaldaboan i tida i a-soo-wiy-se, sakay no an-soo ko satabakiay, sato '' o an-soo '' (a-lang-i' ALjongic ) i paywan a kamo sa o tatodoan ko '' sayadahay no tademaw i se '' no kalipona henay a nipikowan, o lipon benisan ko yincomin a kenis palo o to-wa-pa-le ( to-pan), ta-pan-lo ( tay-pan), ta-li-li ( sen-yong ), cow-ka-ko-lay, a-lan-wiy,(an-so) namin kina limaay a kenis. sayawa a nikenisan o posong a kenis kilosaan o ta-o a kakenisan, o posong a kenis ko mikowanay, hamin no kenis idaw ko nipadeng to taylin, picodadan, o kataisingan to sakay demiaddemiad a mikawaw. nadikodan namalalais to sayaway mababenis han palo posong a kenis i ta-o a kenis, 1946 a mihcaan namakayda i ta-o a kenis, namahoda sato idaw ko tapang o sakakaay patayda i posong a mitatengail toa nipangangan to nganga o '' ta-zen a kenis'', kapah to ato ta-o a kenis macacomodcomod malcabaycabay sakay i niyanoan, nika caay kanamoh ko sakakaay no itidaay, o tatanga han malcacad o ta saniy, mahida to onota-o a kenisan ko nikasaan, nayi' ko masacacay a naholican . namahida sa o sakakaay sinipatayda to i kenis mala tapang ''ke-liyang-pay '' mipalita to a mitatengil to sakakaay ato niyadoay, hican kina ''ta' '' a misomad palo ''ta'' han, hami no kayki a pahecek sa, patababaw i posong a kingsiho paadih sapalahci. widato ya limaay a binacadan no yincomin o paycacayay a kenis ko posong. 大武山自然保留區 ta-o a boyo' o nipaliwan a kenis o tahek o li-o'ci i 1988 a mihcaan kinaitiniay a kenis o sapahanhan a kitidaan no lekedaw, babemisen palo no ta-o a boyo' o no tahakay a nipiliwanan kina kenis. o ahebal no lalay' makaala to 47,000 a kobop, hamin no Taywan a kanatal no lala' kaahbal 1,3%, namahida mikilol tiya o i'-san ato taloko tosaay a kanatal a piadihan to aidangan, mamin no Taywan o sakatoloay a tabaki no aadingan a kenis. kina kenisan namakayda i amis katokoh i timol hamin no li-ciya a sawac, ce-pen a sawac, tay-ma-li a sawac, cin-long a sawac ato ta-co a sawac nikasaopoan kina limaay a sasaopoan to nanom a kenis, namakatelek no talakaw hatida o 200-3,100 a ditek mabaad kya kitidaan, o caayay kahapinang a katokohiy no dadan a pabesotay i kong-lo kina kenisk a kakitidaan, o nikasaan satabajiay a lala' nipiliwan, o sadatahakay a kilangkilanga masatatodongay a nipiliwan i boyo'. 土坂村 to-pan a niyado' o sakatinenga a nganga kya '' to-pan '' o nipanganga aca ''oki' a niyado' '', i naayaw sa o ta-co a sawac tamelacay sa ko sawacay a nanom, o sakaidaw ko kaldaboan no boting o kabos, i sadingsingan nikasasomad no mihca, o no ki' a mihcaan tahkal, nika kabaliyos to papa a baliyos sisa matastas, hanika ayda malangad henay ko sawacan misakapah to sawac. to-pan a ongsin, o nanom nai' ko kolit nai' ko sanek no tan-sowan no nemneman a nanom, kanca taneng mibanaw tanemililoc taneng to nanomen, ono to-pan a niyado caay kaw o ki' dada no masadomaay a too'd. 南田海岸親水公園 na-tin dadipasan a nanom a piidangan . na-tiyin a dadipasan a nanom to piidangan i ta-zen a kenis no nan-tiyin a niyado' ato makasasaay no na-tiyin a niyado' a laed, dodoc han ko dadan no tay-ciw-sin paliyong to dadan i 26 sin, taayawen aca ko colil to tosa a lasobo no titek, kanca makaadih to takelalay a taypinyangan, mikilo to demiatan nikasomad, taneng a miadih to masadomaay ko bangcal no taypinyang .labo no pidangan sa idaw ko piadihan no kitidaan ato o niapitan to colay a cacolilan. i tepal no piidangan a nanom sa o dadipasan, maadih ko kalomenian, idaw ko salengacay masabonaway a ba'to no na-tiyin, somelic sa ko hekal a takelal, o kakaydihan no katootay mikilin to ba'to a midimod sapisinga. nika pacodad to ko siho no posong, la'cos to mowala' to ba'to no na-tiyin. 南田人文景觀觀景台 o cacekawan to aadihab no na-tiyin zen-on . cacekawan to aadihab no na-tiyin zen-on taneng i baad ko nipiadih to na-tiyin a dadipasan o sinanomay a pidangang ato nan-tiyin a niyado'. i posong sadimolanay o nan-tiyin a niyado' sakacapoan no paywan a binacadan, mapolong namin ko binacadan misanga to '' aadihan to codad no niyado' '', pacomod to sakayadah i tineng, paconos aca to sakatinen a kitidaan, i panan no piadian to codad idaw kya lodak, o piw-cong a kolit, o malemetay kina paywan a binacadan. i tepal no picekawan sa, idaw kya cacayay a pibatikalan a dadan no zen-on to aadihan i ta-zen a kenis, ya babatikalan idaw ko limaay a lasobo no ditek, taneng henay a tababaw miadih to ahbalay no piadiha ko bangcal no bayo.
